attributes.action: Help Scotland to enter it's own Eurovision Song Contest entry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scotland should be able to enter it's own song for the Eurovision Song Contest. Our neighbours Ireland have been successful in the past and Scotland should be able to compete on the Eurovision stage in her own right.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
